This survey revealed, inter alia, that production of galvanized iron sheets and wire and wire products was not nearly sufficient to meet the present demand or the estimated future requirements. Instructions have been issued to the manufacturers to divert to Queensland over the next nine weeks an additional quota of 450 tons to reduce the deficit of 1,334 tons, and further adjustments will be made at the expiration of this period. The machinery provided is generally limited to one tractor, plus auxiliary equipment, but mayvary from a small {arm tractor outfit to a large land clearing tractor-bulldozer outfit. 3.
